transArray.content: The location of the hotel is excellent, very close to the subway entrance, and it just so happens that the Lianghui Hotel has been patrolled by armed police on Qianmen Street these days. I feel at ease hahahahahaha I didn't pay attention to the inner window when I booked the room and asked the lady at the front desk to give it to me I was upgraded to a room, but I didn't expect to be upgraded for free! Thank you very much❤️Although the room size is small, this bed type design is very suitable for a girl who lives alone and feels safe! It is also very close to Tiananmen Square and it is very convenient to watch the flag raising. This time I chose this hotel temporarily for transit, and I am very satisfied. I will continue to choose this hotel next time I come to Beijing!
